content: triad scarf designer wendy van leeuwen @mycrochetteacher video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=qusc7joiwvk difficulty level 1 beginner abbreviations yarn 500 yards #3 and a 4 mm crochet hook st s - stitch es or #4 weight yarn and a 5 mm crochet hook chain or chain - chain double_crochet or double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - double_crochet two together instructions chain 32 row 1 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook and in each chain across to the last two chains decrease over the last 2 chain 29 double_crochet turn row 2 turn chain 2 double_crochet in the next st counts as one double_crochet double_crochet in each st across to the last two sts decrease over the last 2 sts 27 double_crochet row 3 turn chain 2 double_crochet in the next st counts as one double_crochet double_crochet in each st across to the last two sts decrease over the last 2 sts repeat row 3 decreasing one st at each end of each row for a total of 14 row row 14 should have 3 sts decrease double_crochet decrease turn chain 2 decrease additional triangle turn as if to do another row you will be picking up sts along the side of the triangle chain 2 work 2 double_crochet in the side of each row in the last row work a decrease you should have 29 double_crochet decrease 27 double_crochet decrease work row 2 as above work row 3 as above repeat row 3 decreasing one st at each end of each row for a total of 14 row row 14 should have 3 sts decrease double_crochet decrease turn chain 2 decrease work additional triangles until the scarf reaches the desired length
